attributes.action: Do not extend the Royal Family exemption from the Freedom of Information Act
attributes.additional_details: The Royal Family exemption from the Freedom of Information Act is to be extended to cover all communications regarding the Queen, Prince Charles and Prince William, even correspondence by other members of the Royal Family and the Royal Household and staff which is currently subject to public interest. This will further cloak the Royal Family's role in government affairs as well as their use of public money. The exemption should not be extended.
